title: ADHARI PARK FONTS
content:
One of my Fonts/Achievements..

Two private modern font families for (ADHARI PARK) in Bahrain / Middle East. The first family has three styles which is light, regular and bold; for corporate using. The second family has one childish style.

[http://qalligraphy.net/achievements/adhari\_park\_fonts.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414232713/http:/qalligraphy.net/achievements/adhari_park_fonts.jpg "http://qalligraphy.net/achievements/adhari\_park\_fonts.jpg")

[http://qalligraphy.net/?page=achievements&id=1](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414232713/http:/qalligraphy.net/?page=achievements&id=1 "http://qalligraphy.net/?page=achievements&id=1")
author: Qassim
